name: Murder Birds (EmzzyDynasty)
description:
Murder Birds is a Finnished and ready to play game created by EmzzyDynasty. The game focuses on a bird whose aim is to wipe out all of the purple monsters and to prevent the monsters from causing any havoc. This is a really fun game and we the team @emzzydynasty are very confident you will like to try it out.

Thank you very much

Courtesy: EmzzyGroup
